page.title: 09LOCAL NEWS
page.content: One of the features taken from the local newspaper on{June 14th}contains the amusing story of the sabden {"Treacle Miners". A{Sabden}family have developed a cottage industry from the old legend of the{ "Sabden Treacle Miners".} Barbara and Bill Dewhurst are the producers of the treacle mine characters.It began in February after Bill was made redundant from his job as an engineer and sales director with Harrogate company.All the family decided to make a business themselves with a lot of help from the Government.The couples grown_up children Christine,Helen and Philip are all making the small toy characters which they hope,one day could rival the{"Wombles". {FIONA HINDLE, ANNE-MARIE BACKHOUSE {and KIRSTY CATLOW.
